mapper.insert: insert into t_membertype (memTypeID, memTypeName, memTypeDiscount, memTypeDesc, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy) values (#{memtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memtypediscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memtypedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_membertype set memTypeName = #{memtypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, memTypeDiscount = #{memtypediscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, memTypeDesc = #{memtypedesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delFlag = #{delflag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, lastSubTime = #{lastsubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where memTypeID = #{memtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select memTypeID, memTypeName, memTypeDiscount, memTypeDesc, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_membertype where memTypeID = #{memtypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select memTypeID, memTypeName, memTypeDiscount, memTypeDesc, delFlag, lastSubTime, subBy from t_membertype
